descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a whole new tier of armor and weapons into the game, each with crafting and tempering recipes.

Due to the complex nature of the crafting requirements and the materials needed, I have included a full list of the items in the Read Me file contained within. Please consult that should you find yourself worrying about why you can't see the crafting recipes. Due to the length of the list, it won't be shown here.

Weapons and armor (if you're eligible to craft it) will come up under the Daedric section, the ring and amulet under Jewellery.

The pictures displayed are of all the items in this mod.


Check out this much appreciated video made by [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/TheYoudojo]YouDojo[/url] to help show off the mod:

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MnpRC5b6wUA]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MnpRC5b6wUA[/url]


Note: People stating the obvious and or complaining about my use of modified default textures will be ignored. I'm not good with textural works and don't understand meshing yet. I'm programming orientated.

Note: Before anyone asks about the inconsistencies in the graphics, yes I have been working on this a while and yes I did take the pictures at different times of day and phases of development.

If you have any other questions, feel free to leave a comment. I'll find it eventually.
author: AbeTheBlackFox
